thread.title: Whoopi Goldberg's tour bus burns during show
thread.title_full: Whoopi Goldberg's tour bus burns during show

title: Whoopi Goldberg's tour bus burns during show
text:
Whoopi Goldberg's tour bus burns during Canada show UGC/NBC 12:32 PM, Oct 25, 2015 A fire at a casino in New Brunswick, Canada, forced comedian Whoopi Goldberg to cut short a show last night. UGC/NBC Previous Next 
NEW BRUNSWICK, CANADA -- A fire at a casino in New Brunswick, Canada, forced comedian Whoopi Goldberg to cut short a show last night. 
A witness said people at the show were told that the fire occurred on Goldberg's tour bus that was parked at the back of the building. 
These photos from the scene show smoke pouring from the bus and emergency crews on the scene. 
Police and staff at the casino confirmed there was a fire but did not immediately have further details. 
A woman who was at the event said the audience started smelling smoke near the end of Goldberg's show. 
She said people started making their way toward the doors but that no one panicked.
